title: Amulet of reflection
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Type | Jewellery                                                                                            |
| :--- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | Amulet of reflection                                                                                 |
| Icon | [![Amulet of reflection.png](/images/a/a3/Amulet_of_reflection.png)](/File:Amulet_of_reflection.png) |

|   |                                                                                                                                              |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An amulet which exerts a force that blocks some incoming attacks, and can even reflect any blocked ranged attacks back towards the attacker. |

Wearing an [amulet of reflection]() provides 5 [SH](/SH "SH") and the [reflection](/Reflection "Reflection") ego. When projectiles (either ranged weapons or certain types of spells like [Stone Arrow](/Stone_Arrow "Stone Arrow")) are blocked, they are always reflected back at the attacker.

## Strategy

This amulet's +5 SH is a fairly strong bonus to your defense. Unlike other amulets, the SH bonus is consistent: it doesn't wear off like [acrobat](/Acrobat "Acrobat"), or require MP as with [guardian spirit](/Guardian_spirit "Guardian spirit"). Therefore, it is a strong option for just about any character. But certain characters may want another amulet for its properties.

The ability to reflect projectiles can be useful, particularly against ranged enemies like [centaurs](/Centaur_\(monster\) "Centaur (monster)") and [yaktaurs](/Yaktaur "Yaktaur"). But the reflection is a minor benefit when compared to the SH bonus. Note that players with higher SH (from [shields](/Shield "Shield") or other sources) will block more often, so will reflect projectiles more often.

## See Also

- [Brooch of Shielding](/Brooch_of_Shielding "Brooch of Shielding") - [unrand](/Unrand "Unrand") amulet that grants more SH, but with [guardian spirit](/Guardian_spirit "Guardian spirit") instead of reflection.

## History

- Prior to [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), in order to function, the amulet had to attune itself to the wearer at full health.
- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), amulets of reflection provided 2 to 6 SH and did not require attunement at full HP.
- The amulet of reflection was added in [0.18](/0.18 "0.18").

Type Jewellery
Name Amulet of reflection
Icon
An amulet which exerts a force that blocks some incoming attacks, and can even reflect any blocked ranged attacks back towards the attacker.

Wearing an amulet of reflection provides 5 SH and the reflection ego. When projectiles (either ranged weapons or certain types of spells like Stone Arrow) are blocked, they are always reflected back at the attacker.

Strategy

Therefore, it is a strong option for just about any character. But certain characters may want another amulet for its properties.

The ability to reflect projectiles can be useful, particularly against ranged enemies like centaurs and yaktaurs. But the reflection is a minor benefit when compared to the SH bonus. Note that players with higher SH (from shields or other sources) will block more often, so will reflect projectiles more often.

See Also

  • Brooch of Shielding - unrand amulet that grants more SH, but with guardian spirit instead of reflection.

History

  • Prior to 0.26, in order to function, the amulet had to attune itself to the wearer at full health.
  • Prior to 0.25, amulets of reflection provided 2 to 6 SH and did not require attunement at full HP.
  • The amulet of reflection was added in 0.18.
